description: The Franklin Tree is a truly amazing plant species found near the banks of the Altamaha River in Georgia. Its beautiful, large white and pink flowers are an incredible sight in the summer and autumn, providing a stunning contrast to the lush green foliage. Its fragrant blooms have an unforgettable scent that is pleasant and inviting. The foliage offers warmth and protection in the colder months, changing to yellow and orange shades in the autumn, and shedding leaves throughout the winter. Itâ€™s an incredibly hardy tree, making it ideal for lawns, gardens and parks; it be used in a variety of landscaping projects. All in all, the Franklin Tree is a wonderful plant that should be cherished and appreciated for its unique beauty and unique features.
